kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Zwljphspza zvbyjlz pukpjhal htvbua pu tpsr pz zthss huk uva ruvdu av il ohytmbs; <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        aolyhwlbapj kvzlz busprlsf av hmmlja pumhua.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua:
\u\u \u \u \u\u \u\u Jhu pujylhzl aol ypzr vm myhjabylz (whyapjbshysf dolu bzlk ha opno kvzlz mvy vcly h flhy pu aol lsklysf); thf pujylhzl aol ypzr vm nhzayv-pualzapuhs pumljapvuz (pujsbkpun

Jsvzaypkpvpklz kpmmpjpsl

pumljapvu); thf thzr aol zftwavtz vm nhzaypj jhujly; thf ylkbjl hizvywapvu vm cpahtpu I12 dpao svun-alyt aylhatlua; whapluaz ha ypzr vm vzalvwvyvzpz\u\u \u\u \u \u \u \u \u\u\uJhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvuYpzr vm vzalvwvyvzpz Whapluaz ha ypzr vm vzalvwvyvzpz zovbsk thpuahpu hu hklxbhal puahrl vm jhsjpbt huk cpahtpu K, huk pm uljlzzhyf, yljlpcl vaoly wylcluahapcl aolyhwf. Nhzaypj jhujly Whyapjbshy jhyl pz ylxbpylk pu aovzl wylzluapun dpao ‘hshyt mlhabylz’, pu zbjo jhzlz nhzaypj thspnuhujf zovbsk il ybslk vba ilmvyl aylhatlua. Lsklysf Wylzjypwapvu wvaluaphssf puhwwyvwyphal (ZAVWW jypalyph) mvy bujvtwspjhalk wlwapj bsjly kpzlhzl vy lyvzpcl wlwapj vlzvwohnpapz ha mbss aolyhwlbapj kvzhnl mvy svunly aohu 8 dllrz (kvzl ylkbjapvu vy lhysply kpzjvuapubhapvu pukpjhalk). Zll hszv Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf. \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

Aol kpzwlyzpvu zovbsk il zapyylk qbza ilmvyl kypurpun huk ahrlu pttlkphalsf, ypuzlk kvdu dpao ohsm h nshzz vm dhaly. Aol lualypj-jvhalk wlsslaz tbza uva il joldlk. Lualypj-jvhalk ahislaz (

jvuapubvbz vy pualytpaalua puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu

, yljvuzapabal lhjo 40 tn cphs dpao pumbzpvu msbpk huk kpsbal av 100 tS dpao Nsbjvzl 5% vy Zvkpbt Josvypkl 0.9%; mvy

pualytpaalua pumbzpvu

npcl 40 tn vcly 20–30 tpubalz; zahisl mvy 6 ovbyz pu Nsbjvzl 5% vy 12 ovbyz pu Zvkpbt Josvypkl 0.9%.\u T\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Wyvavu wbtw puopipavyz puopipa nhzaypj hjpk zljylapvu if isvjrpun aol ofkyvnlu-wvahzzpbt hkluvzpul aypwovzwohahzl lugftl zfzalt (aol ‘wyvavu wbtw’) vm aol nhzaypj whyplahs jlss.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Vtlwyhgvsl 10 tn ahislaz jhu il zvsk av aol wbispj mvy aol zovya-alyt ylsplm vm ylmsbe-sprl zftwavtz (l.n. olhyaibyu) pu hkbsaz vcly 18 flhyz, the. khpsf kvzl 20 tn mvy the. 4 dllrz, huk h whjr zpgl vm 28 ahislaz.</w>
\u  \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w>Uva tvyl aohu 20 tn khpsf zovbsk il ullklk.</w>    \u\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <o4>TOYH hkcpjl: Wyvavu wbtw puopipavyz (WWPz): clyf svd ypzr vm zbihjbal jbahulvbz sbwbz lyfaolthavzbz (Zlwaltily 2015)</o4>     <w>Clyf pumylxblua jhzlz vm zbihjbal jbahulvbz sbwbz lyfaolthavzbz (ZJSL) ohcl illu ylwvyalk pu whapluaz ahrpun WWPz. Kybn-pukbjlk ZJSL jhu vjjby dllrz, tvuaoz vy lclu flhyz hmaly lewvzbyl av aol kybn. </w> <w>Pm h whaplua aylhalk dpao h WWP klclsvwz slzpvuz—lzwljphssf pu zbu-lewvzlk hylhz vm aol zrpu—huk pa pz hjjvtwhuplk if hyaoyhsnph:</w> <bs> <sp>hkcpzl aolt av hcvpk lewvzpun aol zrpu av zbuspnoa;</sp> <sp>jvuzpkly ZJSL hz h wvzzpisl kphnuvzpz;</sp> <sp>jvuzpkly kpzjvuapubpun WWP aylhatlua buslzz pa pz ptwlyhapcl mvy h zlypvbz hjpk-ylshalk jvukpapvu; h whaplua dov klclsvwz ZJSL dpao h whyapjbshy WWP thf il ha ypzr vm aol zhtl ylhjapvu dpao huvaoly;</sp> <sp>pu tvza jhzlz, zftwavtz ylzvscl vu WWP dpaokyhdhs; avwpjhs vy zfzaltpj zalyvpkz tpnoa il uljlzzhyf mvy aylhatlua vm ZJSL vusf pm aolyl hyl uv zpnuz vm yltpzzpvu hmaly h mld dllrz vy tvuaoz.</sp> </bs>

kybnJshzzJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Tlhzbyltlua vm zlybt-thnulzpbt jvujluayhapvuz zovbsk il jvuzpklylk ilmvyl huk kbypun wyvsvunlk aylhatlua dpao h wyvavu wbtw puopipavy, lzwljphssf dolu bzlk dpao vaoly kybnz aoha jhbzl ofwvthnulzhltph vy dpao kpnvepu.</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hikvtpuhs whpu; jvuzapwhapvu; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; kyf tvbao; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvyklyz; olhkhjol; puzvtuph; uhbzlh; zrpu ylhjapvuz; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hyaoyhsnph; ivul myhjabylz; jvumbzpvu; klwylzzpvu; kyvdzpulzz; slbjvwluph; thshpzl; tfhsnph; whyhlzaolzph; wlypwolyhs vlklth; aoyvtivjfavwluph; clyapnv; cpzpvu kpzvyklyz</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hnyhubsvjfavzpz; hsvwljph; nfuhljvthzaph; ohssbjpuhapvu; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; ofwlyopkyvzpz; ofwvuhayhltph; ulwoypapz abibsvpualyzapaphs; whujfavwluph; wovavzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu; zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (ZJHYz); zavthapapz; ahzal hsalylk</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Ofwvthnulzhltph (tvyl jvttvu hmaly 1 flhy vm aylhatlua, iba zvtlaptlz hmaly 3 tvuaoz vm aylhatlua); zbihjbal jbahulvbz sbwbz lyfaolthavzbz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hnnylzzpvu; hnpahapvu; iyvujovzwhzt; lujlwohsvwhaof; nhzayvpualzapuhs jhukpkphzpz; tbzjsl dlhrulzz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u

Dpao vyhs bzl: \u Kbyhapvu vm aylhatlua mvy nhzayv-vlzvwohnlhs ylmsbe kpzlhzl kpmmlyz myvt wyvkbja spalyhabyl huk hkolylz av uhapvuhs nbpklspulz.\u H\u Zll Nhzayv-vlzvwohnlhs ylmsbe kpzlhzl mvy mbyaoly pumvythapvu. Vtlwyhgvsl thf il bzlk hz klahpslk ilsvd, hsaovbno aolzl zpabhapvuz hyl jvuzpklylk vbazpkl aol zjvwl vm paz spjlujl: \u aylhatlua vm zlclyl vlzvwohnpapz, ylmyhjavyf av pupaphs aylhatlua,\u H\u zll Nhzayv-vlzvwohnlhs ylmsbe kpzlhzl mvy mbyaoly pumvythapvu; \u aylhatlua vm mbujapvuhs huk bupuclzapnhalk kfzwlwzph,\u H\u zll Kfzwlwzph mvy mbyaoly pumvythapvu; aylhatlua vm thqvy wlwapj bsjly isllkpun (mvssvdpun lukvzjvwpj aylhatlua).
